ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We made the night a cloak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and made the night a covering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: made the night as a covering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And made the night a cover.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have made the night as a covering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We made the night to be a covering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and We appointed night for a garment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And have appointed the night as a cloak,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the night as a cover,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have made the night a covering.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and make the night a covering?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And made the night as a covering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And have made the night as a covering (through its darkness),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We made the night a mantle,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And made the night a cover?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And made the night as clothing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:10] and made the night a cloak?, to cover you with its darkness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And have appointed the night as a cloak) and it is said this means: a dwelling,
